headline: Morgan Stanley Insider Sale And Trade Views Shape Risk And Value Narrative
summary: Morgan Stanley (NYSE:MS) co president Daniel A. Simkowitz recently sold company stock, drawing attention to executive activity at the bank. The firm’s Chief Investment Officer is separately outlining views on multiyear shifts in global trade and investment patterns under the Trump administration. Together, the insider sale and public commentary are giving investors fresh information on how Morgan Stanley’s leadership is thinking about risk, capital allocation and global opportunity.
